00096                 public static function encode($text)
00097                 {
00098                         return strtr(strtr(strtolower($text), self::$char_table), self::table());
00099                 }
00100 
00106                 public static function decode($text)
00107                 {
00108                         return strtr($text, array_flip(self::table()));
00109                 }
00110                 
00117                 public static function table()
00118                 {
00119                         $table = self::$translation_table;
00120                         array_walk($table, create_function('&$t', '$t = $t . " ";'));
00121                         return $table;
00122                 }
